query.text: Register Namespace and load human skeletion

query.q: owl_individual_of(EVENT,knowrob:'LiftingArm'), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'startTime', T0), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'endTime', T1), add_stickman_visualization(xsens:'XSensHuman1',T0).
query.text: When is the human lifting the Arm?

query.q: owl_individual_of(EVENT,knowrob:'PointingArm'), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'startTime', T0), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'endTime', T1), add_stickman_visualization(xsens:'XSensHuman1',T0).
query.text: When is the human pointing the Arm?

query.q: owl_individual_of(EVENT,knowrob:'SinkingArm'), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'startTime', T0), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'endTime', T1), add_stickman_visualization(xsens:'XSensHuman1',T0).
query.text: When is the human sinking the Arm?

query.q: task(T), task_goal(T, '(GO-TO ?LOC ?POINTED-AT)'), task_start(T, S), task_end(T, E), owl_individual_of(CMD, knowrob:'Command'), add_speech_bubble(CMD,[0,0.2,1.7]), add_stickman_visualization(xsens:'XSensHuman1',S) .
query.text: Did the human give a command to the robot?

query.q: findall([Obj, E],((task_end(T,E), task_type(T,knowrob:'CRAMAction'), rdf_has(T, knowrob:'designator', Obj))), Objs),!, member([Obj, E], Objs).
query.text: How did you interpret this command?
How often did you interpret the command 'go there'?
----- Queries on the robot's logged belief state -----
